title: Derivative of inverse with trig function

content.prompt: If f(x) = sin x + 2x + 1 and g is the inverse function of f, what is the value of g'(1) ?

choices.label: 1 2 + cos 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F51@

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
